Using the R console, translate each of the following mathematical expressions into R in order to calculate the **numerical value** of the expression.

i. $(16 - 3)/2$              <!-- translate to (16-3)/2        -->
ii. $\sqrt{\frac{19}{3}}$    <!-- translate to sqrt(19/3)      -->
iii. $\cos(\frac{2 \pi}{3})$ <!-- translate to cos(2 * pi / 3) -->
iv. $\pi^3 + 2$              <!-- translate to pi^3 + 2        -->
v. $\pi^{3+2}$               <!-- translate to pi^(3+2)        -->
